name: Planet Punchers
description:
Planet Punchers was made by Guillaume Bailey, Fabiana DeLilla, John Ruiz, James Gaiser, and Jerome Pramotheus, as part of the Florida Interactive Entertainment Academy's Rapid Prototyping program.

All behaviors in the game are fully physics driven, including damage! Your goal is to destroy the enemy's creeps, so your creeps can then destroy the enemy planet.

It's free forever.
